trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that designer tool developers can use to supply a set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> objects, which can be used to apply themes and control skins to controls in a design-time environment.
Page developers and control authors do not use the IThemeResolutionService interface.
The IThemeResolutionService interface is implemented by designer tool developers to supply <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> control builders in the design environment.

The IThemeResolutionService is a container for one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> objects, which in turn supply the <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> objects that apply themes and control skins to controls when they are created in a designer.

An instance of the IThemeResolutionService class can be accessed from a given <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> instance using its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ThemeResolutionService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
An <xref:System.Array> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> object that represents the customization theme from a style sheet.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> that represents the page theme that is applied to a control built by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> object that represents the customization theme on an ASP.NET page.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> that represents the page theme that is applied to a control built by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref>.
